column5: the Anti-Human Trafficking and Juvenile Protection Force office issued arrested a suspect and 6 Victims
column6: (2 Minor) on prostitution charges. It is alleged that young girls were sent to have sex with clients in a hotel and guest house. The raids occurred in 2 locations.------1. At Mlop Svay Leap restaurant
column14: and two female victims.------2. At Sweet Boutique Motel
column19: the office is building a case and sending the suspect to the Phnom Penh Municipal Court
column20: while six victims (and two minors) were handed over to the Phnom Penh Municipal Department of Labor. ------TNN
